articles.title: NFL owners OK flexing of Thursday night games - ESPN
articles.description: NFL owners have approved flexing for "Thursday Night Football" starting this season.
articles.content:
May 22, 2023, 05:20 PM ET
NFL owners have approved flexing for "Thursday Night Football" starting this season during Weeks 13 through 17.
